about_the_game:
You’ve arrived at the page for our free demo. This preview includes the prologue of our game, featuring nearly 8,000 words of story, and introduces you to the world of Damatheia and its inhabitants. We hope you’ll enjoy discovering 7 CG’s, getting to know our cast and collecting all 7 achievements!

We’re hard at work on the full version, and your feedback means everything to us. Share your thoughts, and don’t forget to wishlist and follow us to stay updated!

After losing consciousness on your university rooftop, you awaken on the strange Greek island of Damatheia, where nothing is as it seems. The first person you meet has hooves in place of feet, the dead roam among the living, and even the mighty Gods bicker like mortals.

In the center of it all is you — a seemingly ordinary young man thrust into extraordinary circumstances. Chosen by Zeus Himself to fulfill a divine mission, you must explore the island in search of allies, help its peculiar inhabitants, and work your way toward your ultimate goal: defeating the God of the Underworld.

Unravel the mysteries of Damatheia while facing tough choices, encountering unexpected foes, and uncovering the truth behind your arrival. Who’s really in control, and what price will you pay to fulfill your destiny?

Sora

Thrown into a new world with nothing but your wits and the clothes on your back, you’re the last person anyone would call a hero. But fate has other plans. With danger at every turn and an impossible mission ahead, you’ll have to rise, rally your allies, and prove that even the most unremarkable can become legends.

Kallias

A sharp tongue, sharper horns, and a confidence that could rival the Gods themselves — Kallias is a Satyr who takes life as it comes. But beneath the charm and carefree swagger lies a fierce ally you’d be wise to keep on your side. Don’t mistake his charm for weakness... When it matters, he gets serious.

Vespera

A deadly assassin with a cold demeanor and a killer instinct, Vespera prefers others at an arm’s length. She’s not interested in making friends, but when fate forces you together, you’ll have to work as a team. Stay on her good side, and maybe, just maybe... you’ll catch a glimpse of the warmth she desperately keeps hidden.

Zeus 

The God Above All Gods, Zeus commands respect from all who dwell in the heavens and on earth. Seated on his throne atop Mount Olympus, he rarely involves himself in mortal affairs — unless his image is threatened. He assigns you a task, and you will follow through — or face consequences beyond your comprehension.

  • Engaging Story - Unravel a gripping tale full of twists and turns as you explore Damatheia and learn the truth behind your divine mission.

  • Intriguing Characters - Meet a diverse cast, including a Satyr, an assassin, a mysterious merchant, and a pair of powerful god-brothers, each with their own motivations, secrets, and evolving story arcs.

  • Interactive Minigames - Engage in simple, story-enhancing minigames that deepen your connection to the world of Damatheia.

  • Gorgeous Art - Enjoy stunning character sprites and CGs, all beautifully crafted in-house by our talented artists.

  • Voice Acting - Hear the characters come to life, brought to you by skilled English voice actors.

    Embark on your Odyssey now — the forces of evil won’t wait for you!

short_description: Awaken on the mysterious island of Damatheia with a Godly mission in your backlog. Forge bonds with unlikely allies, make life-altering choices, and battle the undead in this Visual Novel filled with secrets, minigames and multiple endings. What truths will you uncover... and at what cost?
